ObjectTerritory2AssignmentRuleItem.name: ObjectTerritory2AssignmentRuleItem
ObjectTerritory2AssignmentRuleItem.description: A single row of selection criteria for an ObjectTerritory2AssignmentRule object. ObjectTerritory2AssignmentRuleItem can only be created or deleted if the BooleanFilter field on its corresponding ObjectTerritory2AssignmentRule object is a null value. Available if Sales Territories has been enabled.

Field.description: The standard or custom object field that the rule item will operate on.

Operation.description: The criterion to apply for the rule item. For example: equals, notContain, or startsWith.

RuleId.description: The ID of the associated ObjectTerritory2AssignmentRule.

SortOrder.description: The order in which this row is evaluated in relation to other ObjectTerritoryAssignmentRuleItem objects for the given ObjectTerritoryAssignmentRule. This field is required for assignment rule items, which are used in the Boolean conditions in assignment rule formulas.

Value.description: The field value or values to evaluate. For example: if the field is Billing ZIP/Postal Code, a value might be 94105.
